com.communote.common.virusscan

Interface VirusScanner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClamAVScanner, CommandlineScanner, NoneVirusScanner

    public interface VirusScanner
    Virus scanner interface.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init(Properties properties)
      Initialize the Scanner
      void scan(byte[] bytes)
      Scan a byte array for viruses

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(Properties properties)
   throws InitializeException
        Initialize the Scanner
        Parameters:
        properties - Init Properties. This will be used for individual settings.
        Throws:
        InitializeException - Thrown when initialization fails

      • scan

        void scan(byte[] bytes)
   throws VirusScannerException,
          VirusFoundException
        Scan a byte array for viruses
        Parameters:
        bytes - Byte content
        Throws:
        VirusScannerException - This Exception encapsulate any exception
        VirusFoundException - VirusScannerException

      • scan

        void scan(File file)
   throws VirusScannerException,
          VirusFoundException
        Scan file for virus
        Parameters:
        file - Scanning file
        Throws:
        VirusScannerException - VirusScannerException
        VirusFoundException - VirusFoundException

      • scan

        InputStream scan(InputStream stream)
          throws VirusScannerException,
                 VirusFoundException
        Scan an input stream for virus.
        Parameters:
        stream - Data stream
        Returns:
        Return true if a virus was detected else false, when no virus was detected
        Throws:
        VirusScannerException - This Exception encapsulate any exception
        VirusFoundException - This only thrown when a virus was found
